pageProduct.name: QV Bath Oil 1.25L Shower & Bath Oil
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hydrate dry or sensitive skin in the bath. QV Bath Oil’s whole-body moisture replenishment helps to restore your skin’s natural suppleness and healthy glow.

Warnings

CAUTION: Avoid eyes. For external use only. Take care to avoid slipping. Store below 30°C.

Common Uses

• Clear, non-greasy formula rejuvenates large areas of dry or sensitive skin.
• Suitable for use with scaly skin, winter itch, dermatitis, atopic eczema and psoriasis.
• pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol.
• Suitable for even the most sensitive skin types.
• Particularly suitable for infants and the elderly.

Ingredients

paraffinum liquidum, laureth-3, Isopropyl Myristate.

Directions

One capful measures 5ml.
Bath: Add 10ml to adult’s bath or 5ml to baby’s bath. Bathe for 5 to 10 minutes. Pat skin dry. Shower: Rub gently onto wet skin, leave for a few minutes, briefly rinse and pat skin dry.
For persistent dry skin use with QV Gentle Wash and QV Cream. Avoid soap as it may irritate sensitive skin.
